stories.title: Finance Transformation for Global Manufacturer
stories.description: Reimagined financial reporting processes and implemented intelligent automation, reducing month-end close from 12 days to 3 while improving data accuracy.

stories.title: HR Operations Overhaul for Tech Enterprise
stories.description: Transformed fragmented HR processes with a digital-first strategy, reducing onboarding time and implementing self-service capabilities that dramatically improved both employee and HR team experience.

stories.title: Supply Chain Visibility Revolution
stories.description: Created end-to-end supply chain visibility through process optimization and data integration, enabling real-time decision making and predictive analytics capabilities.

stories.title: Procurement Efficiency Breakthrough
stories.description: Redesigned procurement processes and implemented cognitive automation, transforming a cost center into a strategic function that drives both savings and supplier innovation.
